queries.query: tiny fey creature with insect-like wings that lives in enchanted forests
queries.variant: fey creature that is tiny and has insect wings, found in magical forests

queries.query: magical creature that can turn invisible and uses poison arrows
queries.variant: creature that uses arrows with poison and has the ability to become invisible

queries.variant: nature-protecting fey known for its playful behavior and keen senses

queries.query: stealthy tiny creature with low hit points and high dexterity
queries.variant: small creature with exceptional stealth, low health, and great agility

queries.query: fey creature that communicates with plants and has emotional sensing
queries.variant: creature from the fey that can talk to plants and senses emotions
